live_updates: On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
59600.summary: Some customers in the Rosedale area of Chilliwack are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59600.title: Mar 30 - Chilliwack (Rosedale) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
